whisper_hyp: उसे बहुत देड ताक्के नतेजार कर वहाया.
mms_1b_hyp: तुम्हारे पास तीन महीने बच्चे हैं
mms_zs_constrained_hyp: उस ने हँसे। बहुत देर तक नज़र करा
omni_hyp: उसने अबसे बहुत देर तक इंतजार करवाया
ref_dev: उसने हमसे बहुत देर तक इंतेज़ार करवाया।

llm_decision.raw:
LANGUAGE: Hindi  
TRANSCRIPTION: उसने बहुत देर तक इंतजार करवाया  
CONFIDENCE: high  
REASONING: Among all the hypotheses, "omni" provides a grammatically correct and contextually coherent sentence in Hindi. While "mms_zeroshot_constrained" is close in structure, it is incomplete and lacks proper verb form ("हँसे" is unrelated to the context). "Whisper" and "mms_1b" contain errors in grammar, word choice, and meaning. "Omni" correctly captures the intended meaning — someone made someone wait for a long time — with accurate Devanagari script and verb usage. The phrase "बहुत देर तक इंतजार करवाया" is a natural and idiomatic expression in Hindi, and "करवाया" (caused to wait) fits the context better than "नतेजार" or "नज़र करा". Thus, the omni hypothesis is the most accurate and reliable.
